title: Shotcut 24.01 Open-Source Video Editor Released with Many New Features
description:
Shotcut 24.01 open-source video editor is now available for download with various new features and many improvements. Here's what's new!

title: Nautilus File Manager Gets More Features Ahead of the GNOME 46 Release
description:
Nautilus (Files) file manager gets more new features and performance improvements ahead of the GNOME 46 desktop environment release. Here's what's new!

The post Nautilus File Manager Gets More Features Ahead of the GNOME 46 Release appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Looks Like Ubuntu 24.04 LTS Will Be Powered by Linux Kernel 6.8
description:
Canonical confirms that the upcoming Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (Noble Numbat) release will be powered by the Linux 6.8 kernel series to offer users support for the newest hardware and access to the latest kernel features.

The post Looks Like Ubuntu 24.04 LTS Will Be Powered by Linux Kernel 6.8 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
